general.name: JMF Deploy - Check-in Failure Test
general.description: This script is part of JMF Deploy's Jamf Pro Workflows.
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1"> <dict> <key>PayloadUUID</key> <string>CDB7EDC5-EBBC-4907-AEFF-9D71ED6268E9</string> <key>PayloadType</key> <string>Configuration</string> <key>PayloadOrganization</key> <string>JMF Deploy</string> <key>PayloadIdentifier</key> <string>com.JMFDeploy.repaircommunications.binary</string> <key>PayloadDisplayName</key> <string>Jamf Client Communications Repair Binary</string> <key>PayloadDescription</key> <string/> <key>PayloadVersion</key> <integer>1</integer> <key>PayloadRemovalDisallowed</key> <true/> <key>PayloadScope</key> <string>System</string> <key>PayloadContent</key> <array> <dict> <key>PayloadDisplayName</key> <string>Custom Settings</string> <key>PayloadIdentifier</key> <string>com.JMFDeploy.jnuc2024.repaircommunications.binary.ManagedClient</string> <key>PayloadOrganization</key> <string>JMF Deploy</string> <key>PayloadType</key> <string>com.apple.ManagedClient.preferences</string> <key>PayloadUUID</key> <string>C947BCE1-4936-433B-8BDE-C033C6146A38</string> <key>PayloadVersion</key> <integer>1</integer> <key>PayloadContent</key> <dict> <key>com.JMF Deploy.repaircommunications</key> <dict> <key>Forced</key> <array> <dict> <key>mcx_preference_settings</key> <dict> <key>binary</key> <string>null</string> </dict> </dict> </array> </dict> </dict> </dict> </array> </dict> </plist>
